definition.de: Ein Musikgenre, das elektronische Instrumente einsetzt und hauptsächlich für Nachtclubs, Raves und Festivals gemacht ist.
definition.dk: En bred genre af elektronisk baseret dansemusik.
definition.en-GB: A genre of music that employs electronic instruments and is primarily made for nightclubs, raves, and festivals
definition.en-US: A genre of music that employs electronic instruments and is primarily made for nightclubs, raves, and festivals
definition.pt-BR: Gênero musical que usa instrumentos eletrônicos e que é feito principalmente para boates, raves e festivais.
definition.pt-PT: Género musical que usa instrumentos eletrónicos e que é feito principalmente para discotecas, raves e festivais.
definition.se: En bred genre av elektroniskt baserad dans-musik.
definition.zh-Hans: 一种使用电子乐器的音乐类型，主要为夜总会、狂欢会和节日而创作
